outputs.output_descr: By end 2011 the Kyrgyz Ombudsman institution is an effective institution to protect and promote human rights in Kyrgyzstan and to defend the rights of the people. This will be achieved through improving the organizational structure of the Institute, restructure the reactive component of it along thematic issues, inreasing organizational capacity, building capacity of the Ombudsman and its staff to effectively handle complaints as well as to analyse patterns of human rights violations, assisting to the Ombudsman in establishing partnership and working relationship with key state institutions, assisting in effective applying pro-active mechanisms to address patterns of human rights violations, building capacity of the Institute to analyse domestic legislation from a human rights perspective and through building capacity in human rights education and providing human rights related information to duty-bearers and rights-holders.

donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMA
outputs.output_descr: By end 2011 the Kyrgyz Ombudsman institution is an effective institution to protect and promote human rights in Kyrgyzstan and to defend the rights of the people. This will be achieved through improving the organizational structure of the Institute, restructure the reactive component of it along thematic issues, inreasing organizational capacity, building capacity of the Ombudsman and its staff to effectively handle complaints as well as to analyse patterns of human rights violations, assisting to the Ombudsman in establishing partnership and working relationship with key state institutions, assisting in effective applying pro-active mechanisms to address patterns of human rights violations, building capacity of the Institute to analyse domestic legislation from a human rights perspective and through building capacity in human rights education and providing human rights related information to duty-bearers and rights-holders.

project_descr: United Nations Technical Assistance Programme for the Kyrgyz Ombudsman Institution
